name: douse-drive
effect:
Held by genesect
:   Holder's buster is blue, and its techno blast is water-type.
short_effect: Grants Genesect a blue, Water-type Techno Blast.

flavor_text_entries.black-white:
A cassette to be held by Genesect.
It changes Techno Blast to a
Water-type move.
